docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 10 --The International Monetary Fund announced today that it had given Iran, Uruguay and Paraguay authority to draw money from the fund within the next twelve months.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 10 --The International Monetary Fund announced today that it had given Iran, Uruguay and Paraguay authority to draw money from the fund within the next twelve months.
docs.abstract: authorizes withdrawal of $35 million to aid stabilization

headline.main: 3 NATIONS TO GET WORLD FUND HELP; Approval to Draw Money Is Given to Paraguay, Iran and Uruguay

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., Oct. 13 -- Following is the roll-call vote by which the General Assembly rejected a Soviet motion to discuss what the Russians called aggressive acts by the United States:

docs.snippet: GEN. CARLOS SEVERO TORANZO MONTERO, a stormy petrel in Argentine affairs, was involved again yesterday in the revived governmental crisis in Argentina. His outspoken defense of democratic ideals has caused him repeated difficulties in his military...
docs.lead_paragraph: GEN. CARLOS SEVERO TORANZO MONTERO, a stormy petrel in Argentine affairs, was involved again yesterday in the revived governmental crisis in Argentina. His outspoken defense of democratic ideals has caused him repeated difficulties in his military and diplomatic careers.

headline.main: Outspoken Argentine; Carlos Severo Toranzo Montero

docs.snippet: CANNES, France, Oct. 18 -- The International Air Transport Association reached agreement tonight on lower-class fare reductions between North and South America and between the West Coast of the United States and Tokyo.
docs.lead_paragraph: CANNES, France, Oct. 18 -- The International Air Transport Association reached agreement tonight on lower-class fare reductions between North and South America and between the West Coast of the United States and Tokyo.
docs.abstract: IATA reaches 2-yr accord cutting econ class fares
